INSERT INTO `addonarticle` VALUES('5406','145','<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　在职研究生人员以同等学力的身份申请硕士学位需要参加国家组织的同等学历申请硕士学位全国统考(以下简称申硕考试)。有国家教育部出题，全国统一考试。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　大部分专业的申硕考试考两个内容：英语水平考试和专业课综合水平考试。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　英语水平考试难度国家定位在大学英语四级到六级之间，通俗的说法是五级半的水平。从2005年开始取消听力，改为情景对话选择题。满分100分，60分合格。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　专业课综合水平考试，根据专业不同，考试内容也不同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　如果选择金融学专业，专业课综合考试就是经济学综合考试，考试内容包括：西方经济学(微观经济学、宏观经济学)、社会主义经济理论、货币银行学、国际经济学、财政学。把这几门的内容放在同一张卷子上面考试。满分100分，60分合格。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　如果选择企业管理或者是会计学专业，综合考试就是管理学综合，考试内容包括：企业战略管理、营销学、管理学原理、财务管理。。满分100分，60分合格。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　如果是法学综合，内容包括：法理学、民法学、刑法学、宪法学、中国法制史。满分100分，60分合格。</p>\r\n','','','59.108.73.73');

Everyone is equal before the law.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法律面前人人平等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　15. First in time， first in right.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　先在权利优先。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　16. No rights can rest on one person without a corresponding duty resting on some other person or persons.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　没有无义务的权利。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　17. In most civil contexts it does not matter whether negligence is &ldquo;gross&rdquo; or &ldquo;slight&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　在多数民事事项环境中，过失行为是否&ldquo;严重&rdquo;或&ldquo;轻微&rdquo;并不关紧要。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　18. Traditionally， firm referred to a partnership， as opposed to a company.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　按惯例，firm是指合伙企业，与公司相对。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　19.A transaction between two parties ought not to operate to the disadvantage of a third.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　合约不约束第三人。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　20. An acceptance once given cannot be revoked unless the offeror consents.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　除非要约人同意，承诺一经做出即不得撤回。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　21. A contract may be modified if the parties reach a consensus through consultation.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　当事人协商一致即可以变更合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　22. Any amendments to this contract shall become effective only by a written agreement by Party A and Party B.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　对本合同的任何修改，只有经甲、乙双方签署书面协议后方能生效。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　23. Any annex is the integral part of this contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　24. Any departure from the terms and conditions of the contract must be advised in writing.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　任何与合同条款相背离的地方，都应以书面形式通知。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　25. Any failure by a party to carry out all or part of his obligations under the contract shall be considered as a substantial breach.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　一方当事人不履行本合同的全部或任何部分义务均应被视为是根本违约。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　26. Any party has no right to terminate this contract without another party&lsquo;s agreement.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　未经另一方当事人同意，任何当事人均无权终止本合同。</p>\r\n<br />\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　27.Examples of void contracts are those entered as a result of misrepresentation， duress or undue influence.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　因欺诈、胁迫和乘人之危而签订的合同属于可撤销合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　28. If any of the above-mentioned clauses is inconsistent with the following additional clauses， the latter to be taken as authentic.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　以上任何条款如与下列附加条款相抵触，以下列附加条款为准。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　29. If there are provisions as otherwise stated in respect to contracts in other laws， such provisions shall be followed.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　其他法律对合同另有规定的，应依照这些规定。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　30.No consideration， no contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　合同无对价不成立。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　31. Other special terms will be listed bellows.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　甲、乙双方如有特殊约定将在下列另行约定。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　32. Party A and B have reached an agreement through friendly consultation to conclude the following contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　甲、乙双方，经友好协商一致，订立本合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　33. Parties hereto may revise or supplement through negotiation matters not mentioned herein.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　本合同如有未尽事宜，双方可协商修订或补充。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　34. The parties may dissolve the contract upon consensus through consultation.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　当事人协商一致，可以解除合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　35. Counsel must not lead the witness.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　律师不得诱导证人。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　36. The jury returned a verdict of guilty， and the judge will pass sentence next week.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　陪审团裁定有罪，法官将于下周判刑。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　37. The jury was unable to reach a unanimous decision.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　陪审团未能达成意见一致的裁决。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　38.Judgment was entered for the plaintiff.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　判决原告胜诉。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　39. Now the court is in session.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　现在开庭。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　40. Order in the court.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法庭内保持肃静。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　41. objection -反对 objection overruled&mdash;&mdash;反对驳回</p>\r\n<p>\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n','','','59.108.73.73');

font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　3.This contract is made of one original and two duplicate originals， all of which are of the same effect.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　本合同一式三份，具有同等效力。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　4. The law does not concern itself about family trifles.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法律难断家务事。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　5.This document is legally binding.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　该文件具有法律约束力。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　6. This law is in abeyance.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　此法暂缓执行。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　7. This law has become a dead letter.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　此法已成为一纸空文。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　8. This law will go into effect on the day of its promulgation.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　本法自公布之日起施行。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　9 The court dismissed the action.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法院驳回诉讼。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　10. The court ordered the case to be retried.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法院命令重审此案&hellip;&hellip;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　11.Giving the killer what he deserves.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　予杀人者以应得之罪。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　12. Hate the sin but not the sinner.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　可恨的是罪行而非罪人。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　13.Everyone has the right to freedom of expression.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　每个人都享有言论自由。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　14. Everyone is equal before the law.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　法律面前人人平等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　15. First in time， first in right.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　先在权利优先。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　16. No rights can rest on one person without a corresponding duty resting on some other person or persons.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　没有无义务的权利。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　17. In most civil contexts it does not matter whether negligence is &ldquo;gross&rdquo; or &ldquo;slight&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　在多数民事事项环境中，过失行为是否&ldquo;严重&rdquo;或&ldquo;轻微&rdquo;并不关紧要。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　18. Traditionally， firm referred to a partnership， as opposed to a company.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　按惯例，firm是指合伙企业，与公司相对。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　19.A transaction between two parties ought not to operate to the disadvantage of a third.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　合约不约束第三人。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　20. An acceptance once given cannot be revoked unless the offeror consents.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　除非要约人同意，承诺一经做出即不得撤回。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　21. A contract may be modified if the parties reach a consensus through consultation.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　当事人协商一致即可以变更合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　22. Any amendments to this contract shall become effective only by a written agreement by Party A and Party B.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　对本合同的任何修改，只有经甲、乙双方签署书面协议后方能生效。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　23. Any annex is the integral part of this contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　24. Any departure from the terms and conditions of the contract must be advised in writing.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　任何与合同条款相背离的地方，都应以书面形式通知。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　25. Any failure by a party to carry out all or part of his obligations under the contract shall be considered as a substantial breach.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　一方当事人不履行本合同的全部或任何部分义务均应被视为是根本违约。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　26. Any party has no right to terminate this contract without another party&lsquo;s agreement.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; clear: both; \">\r\n	　　未经另一方当事人同意，任何当事人均无权终止本合同。</p>\r\n<br />\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　27.Examples of void contracts are those entered as a result of misrepresentation， duress or undue influence.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　因欺诈、胁迫和乘人之危而签订的合同属于可撤销合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　28. If any of the above-mentioned clauses is inconsistent with the following additional clauses， the latter to be taken as authentic.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　以上任何条款如与下列附加条款相抵触，以下列附加条款为准。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　29. If there are provisions as otherwise stated in respect to contracts in other laws， such provisions shall be followed.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　其他法律对合同另有规定的，应依照这些规定。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　30.No consideration， no contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　合同无对价不成立。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　31. Other special terms will be listed bellows.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　甲、乙双方如有特殊约定将在下列另行约定。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　32. Party A and B have reached an agreement through friendly consultation to conclude the following contract.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　甲、乙双方，经友好协商一致，订立本合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　33. Parties hereto may revise or supplement through negotiation matters not mentioned herein.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　本合同如有未尽事宜，双方可协商修订或补充。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　34. The parties may dissolve the contract upon consensus through consultation.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　当事人协商一致，可以解除合同。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　35. Counsel must not lead the witness.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　律师不得诱导证人。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　36. The jury returned a verdict of guilty， and the judge will pass sentence next week.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　陪审团裁定有罪，法官将于下周判刑。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　37. The jury was unable to reach a unanimous decision.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　陪审团未能达成意见一致的裁决。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　38.Judgment was entered for the plaintiff.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　判决原告胜诉。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　39. Now the court is in session.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　现在开庭。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　40. INSERT INTO `addonarticle` VALUES('5431','144','<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　临近考试了，关注2012年同等学力考试的考生们心里也是越来越紧张，无论做什么都放松不下来。我同大家一样，也很紧张，恨不得变个勤劳的小蜜蜂帮助大家考试。其实有很多同学现在已经不太需要我的帮助，只需要正常发挥就可以。我跟很多同学讲，要沉住气，不管自己多差多好，现在能不要像无头苍蝇就是成功的第一步，惊喜一定能在两个多月后等着你。尽管好的心态有时不代表真正的成功，可是它能让你正常。我并非是虚伪地安慰大家.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　所以在这几天里面，你只要正常地生活、学习，给自己的复习安排一个合理的计划，执行即可。因为你前期已经尽力了，尽管你怨恨自己为什么背完的单词想不起来了，做过的题又错了，一翻书觉得哪哪都不会，时间总那么不够用，甚至怨恨自己为什么长着正常的人脑袋而不是电脑，奢望老师跟悟空一样突然在网上放上一篇通告&quot;2012年真题下载&quot;。你想的一切都不对，你只要做到以下几点，你就已经看到真题了：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　1、 每天做4-5篇阅读或一篇完型，维持自己的题感。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　2、 词汇、口语和辨错部分就看历年真题和以前做过的题，加深印象。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　3、 复习基础、提高和强化班每周一练里的翻译和作文材料，精品密训的翻译写作材料，里面的话题要熟悉，如：民工、能源与环境、父母与孩子的沟通(父母对孩子的教育方式，溺爱和上网问题)、自然灾难(找我们以前做过的雪灾的汉译英)、奥运(体育相关)、教师的职责等等，这里我就不一一赘述了)，真题的话题逃不过我们练过的内容。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　4、 有意识地将生物钟调整到上午9点开始兴奋。方法?在9点开始做题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　5、 当考场上阅读第一篇让你脑子一片空白的时候，改作词汇或辨错，用较小的代价稳定情绪;当作文题目让你不知所措而时间有毫不留情地流逝的时候，回忆一篇你最熟悉的文章(范文或自己写过的都行)，工工整整地把字排列上去，切记，第一段要把作文题中那个斜体和粗体字誊抄上去，此时不要让卷面有让人视觉难受的地方。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　6、 牢记，这几天你只能捡分，也就是说你平时的水平通过这几天的查漏补缺，不仅能维持，还能不断往上累积。量的增长是必然的，质的飞跃很困难。但别忘了，量变引起质变(55分的基础捡着捡着就飞跃啦)，现在遍地都是分数，看你能不能踏踏实实地一分一分拾，而不是想用簸箕撮(太俗的大白话)。比如，你突然想起economy,一下想不起它的意思，别慌，问一问，查一查，知道了就捡分了，应该高兴而不要批评自己。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 30px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 25px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 26px; clear: both; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	　　7、 现在不要轻易就给自己定位过不了，除非你不考和在考场上晕倒。牢记，不要自己再给自己增加压力，你已经够辛苦的了，加了压力结果只能比正常的要糟糕，除非你现在整天还在睡大觉。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 0px;
