margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.离差智商</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4. &beta;错误</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5.内容效度</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	6.最近发展区</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	7. 刻板印象</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	8. 群体极化</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	三、 简答题（每小题6分，共36分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.简述耶基斯一多得森（Yerkes-Dodson）法则。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2. 简述影响问题解决的心理因素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3. 简述方差分析的使用条件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.简述提高研究的内部效度的方法。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5. 简述选择统计方法应考虑的主要因素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	6. 难度和区分度的关系。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	四、 论述题（每小题10分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1. 论述动机的含义及其功能。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2. 简述依恋的含义、类型及阶段。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2012同等学力心理学综合模考试题参考答案</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	一、 单项选择题（每小题1分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.C 2.A 3. A 4. A 5. D 6.B 7.C</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	8.B 9. B 10. A 11.A 12.A 13.B 14.C</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	15. B 16. C 17.A 18.C 19. A 20. B</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	二、 名词解释（每小题3分，共24分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1. 知觉恒常性</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	知觉恒常性是指当知觉的客观条件在一定范围内改变时，人们的知觉映像在相当程度上仍然保持稳定性的知觉特征，即个体在不同的距离、角度、光线等条件下知觉同一物体时，知觉的映像保持相对稳定的知觉特征。视知觉恒常性是人们知觉客观事物时的一个重要特性，对于人们的正常生活和工作有重要意义。知觉恒常性主要包括形状恒常性、大小恒常性、明度恒常性、颜色恒常性等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2、思维</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	思维是人脑借助言语、表象或动作实现的对客观现实的概括和间接的反映。思维具有概括性和间接性两个基本特征。思维不同于感知觉，但又离不开感知觉活动提供的感性材料。在思维过程中，人只有在获取大量感性材料的基础上，才能在头脑中对事物进行分析与综合、抽象与概括，并通过概念、判断、推理等思维形式把握事物的本质特征与内部联系。人的思维与语言是紧密地联系在一起的。按照发展水平的不同，思维可以分为直观动作思维、具体形象思维和抽象思维等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.离差智商</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	离差智商就是用标准分数来表示的智商，即让每一个被试和他同年龄的人相比，而不像以前比纳量表所用的智商是和上下年龄的人相比。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4. &beta;错误</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	又叫II型错误，即虚无假设为假时，接受虚无假设所犯的错误的概率。即为存伪错误。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5.内容效度</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	内容效度指的是测验题目对有关内容或行为范围取样的适当性，这种测验的效度主要与测验内容有关，所以叫内容效度。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	6.最近发展区</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	维果斯基提出了&ldquo;最近发展区&rdquo;的思想。维果斯基认为，儿童智力发展有两种水平，一种是现有水平，即儿童当前所达到的智力发展状况；另一种水平是在现有状况的基础上，经过努力，特别是在有能力的同伴或成人帮助下所能达到的一种新的发展状态。在这两种水平间存在着差异，这个差异带就叫做最近发展区。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	7. 刻板印象</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	人们对某一类人或者事物产生的比较固定、概括而笼统的看法。刻板印象常常是指人们通过长期的经验所形成的比较固定的看法，这种看法常常可能作为人们做出行为判断的基础。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	8. 群体极化</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	群体极化也称为&ldquo;群体两极分化&rdquo;，它是指群体成员中原已存在的倾向性得到加强，使一种观点或态度从原来的群体平均水平加强到具有支配性地位的现象。群体讨论可以形成群体极化，使原先群体支持的意见更为支持，原先群体反对的意见更为反对，从而最终使群体的意见出现&ldquo;极端化&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	三、 简答题（每小题6分，共36分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.简述耶基斯一多得森（Yerkes-Dodson）法则。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机引发和维持活动，但是动机的强度与活动效率并不是完全的正比关系。（1分）一般来说，动机强度与活动效率的关系呈倒&ldquo;U&rdquo;型，即在动机强度为中等水平时，活动效率最高，动机不足或过分强烈，都会导致活动效率的下降。每种活动都存在动机的最佳水平。动机的最佳水平随任务的性质（难度）不同而不同，随着任务难度的增加，动机的最佳水平有逐渐下降的趋势。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2. 简述影响问题解决的心理因素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	问题解决的思维过程受到多种心理过程的影响，有些因素对问题解决有促进的作用，有些因素则起着阻碍的作用。第一个因素是问题情境。问题情境是指个人所面临的刺激模式与个人的认知结构所形成的差异，一般说来，刺激模式与个人认知结构的差异越大，问题就越难解决；第二个因素是定势。定势是由于心理操作所形成的模式所引起的心理活动的准备状态，也是人们在过去经验的影响下，形成的解决问题时的倾向性；第三个因素是功能固着。功能固着是指人们把某种功能赋予某种物体的倾向性；第四个因素是知识经验，解决问题所必须具有相应的知识经验。除开这四个因素以外，智慧水平、动机强度、认知策略、个性特征等也会影响着问题的解决。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3. 简述方差分析的使用条件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（1）数据正态性，总体分布是正态或近似正态</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（2）方差可加，总方差应为各方差分量的和</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（3） 方差齐性，各实验处理的方差相等</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	数据变化不大</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	可用检验方法确定</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	如果各组被试人数相等可视为方差齐性</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（4）因变量数据若为等比或等距数据，用参数的方法；</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（5）若为等级变量，则应该用非参数方法</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.简述提高研究的内部效度的方法。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	内部效度指研究的自变量与因变量之间关系的确定性，即保证因变量的变化系由特定的自变量而不是其他的外部变量所引起。要使研究有较高的内部效度，就必须控制各种外部变量，消除它们对研究结论的影响。这些外部变量通常有成熟因素、历史因素、被试选择上哦差异、被试缺失产生的效应、前侧效应、实验程序不一致或处理扩散产生的效应、统计回归效应、多种研究条件与因素间的交互作用等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5. 简述选择统计方法应考虑的主要因素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	选择正确有效的统计分析方法，必须要考虑两个方面的问题：一是研究问题的性质、数据类型和特征以及统计设计，二是各种统计方法和公式的使用条件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	所以要选择合适的统计分析方法必须考虑的因素有：1、研究课题的性质和目的；2、变量的特征，包括变量的数量和类型；3、数据的分布特征，主要可分为正态和非正态两种；4、研究设计类型。研究设计可分为被试内设计和被试间设计以及混合设计等几种。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	6. 难度和区分度的关系。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	区分度是测量学中的专有名词，区分度是衡量题目质量的主要指标之一，是在编制测验时筛选题目的依据。区分度是指一道题能多大程度上把不同水平的人区分开来，也即题目的鉴别力。区分度越高，越能把不同水平的受测者区分开来，该道题目被采用的价值也就越大。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	题目的难度过高，很少人能答对，大部分得分都很低；难度过低，很少人会答错，分数分布在高分端。因而过难或过易的题目都不能很好地区分不同水平的个体。因而当题目的难度为中等时，区分度最高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	不同难度的题目对于不同水平的人来说区分度是不同的。鉴于全体受测者的能力分布往往是呈正态的，测验中题目难度的分布也基本为正态分布，即难、中、易都有分布，中等难度题目最多。只有这样才能保证整个测验有较高的鉴别力。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	四、 论述题（每小题10分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1. 论述动机的含义及其功能。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机是由一种目标或对象所引导、激发和维持个体活动的内在心理过程或内部动力。动机是构成人类大部分行为的基础。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机的功能包括以下几点：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（1）激活功能</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机是个体能动性的一个主要方面，它具有发动行为的作用，能推动个体产生某种活动，使个体由静止状态转向活动状态。动机激活力量的大小，是由动机的性质和强度决定的。一般认为，中等强度的动机有利于任务的完成。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（2）指向功能</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机不仅能激发行为，而且能将行为指向一定的对象或目标。动机不一样，个体活动的方向和所追求的目标也是不一样的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（3）维持和调整功能</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	动机具有维持功能，它表现为行为的坚持性。当动机激发个体的某种活动后，这种活动能否坚持下去，同样要受动机的调节和支配。人们在成功的机会很小时，也会坚持某种行为，这时人的长远信念起决定作用。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2. 简述依恋的含义、类型及阶段。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	答：婴儿依恋是婴儿与主要抚养者（通常是母亲）间的最初的社会性联结，也是情感社会化的重要标志。具体表现是：将积极性行为指向母亲，最喜欢和母亲在一起，在母亲身边能使婴儿感到很大安慰，在遇到陌生人和陌生环境而产生恐惧或焦虑时母亲的到来可以使婴儿感觉安全，当饥饿寒冷疲倦疼痛时，首先寻找母亲。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	类型包括：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	第一， 安全型依恋。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	第二，回避型依恋。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	第三，反抗型依恋。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	发展阶段如下：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	第一阶段：无差别的社会反应阶段</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	第二阶段：有差别的社会反应阶段</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B是中共领导下的多党合作和政治协商的机构</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C是中国政治生活中发展民主的重要形式</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D其主要职能是政治协商、民主监督和参政议政</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	18.法院在裁判缓刑时，可以根据犯罪情况，同时禁止犯罪分子在执行期间（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A从事特定活动 B进入特定区域、场所</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C接触特定的人 D离开所住市县</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	19.关于老年人犯罪的刑事责任，下列表述正确的是（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A若过失犯罪，应当从轻或者减轻处罚。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B审判的时候已满七十五周岁的人，不适用死刑，但犯故意杀人罪的除外。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C已满七十五周岁的人犯轻罪的，应当宣告缓刑</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D老年人犯罪，不适用累犯及从重处罚的规定</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	20.关于被判处死刑缓期执行同时限制减刑的适用，下列表述正确的是（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A适用所有的死缓犯</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B适用于累犯和杀人等严重暴力犯罪的死缓犯</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C作为累犯的死缓犯不一定适用限制减刑</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D减刑后实际执行刑期不得少于25年</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	21.下列表述中正确的是（　　　）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A管制犯，缓刑犯、假释犯，依法实行社区矫正，社区矫正由当地公安机关执行</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B未成年犯不成立累犯</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C某人犯3种罪，分别判有期徒刑11年、12年、13年，并罚时，不得超过25年</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D国家机关工作人员甲的妻子乙利用甲的职权为丙谋取利益，收受丙的贿赂，只能成立利用影响力受贿罪</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	22.诉讼时效不适用的情形有（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A欠钱还债的请求权</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B支付存款本金及利息请求权</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C兑付国债、金融债券以及向不特定对象发行的企业债券本息请求权</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D基于投资关系产生的缴付出资请求权</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	23.被担保的债权既有第三人提供物的担保的，也有第三人提供的保证，债权人可以（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A先就物的担保实现债权</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B先让保证人承担保证责任</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C债权人可选择只向保证人主张责任，或只主张物的担保责任</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D债权人必须同时主张物的担保和人的保证双重责任，从他们那公平受偿</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	24.不受著作权法保护的有（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A禁止出版、传播的作品</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B法律、法规和国家机关制定的其他规范性文件</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C时事新闻；历法、数表、表格和公式</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; \">\r\n	D已过保护期的作品</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	25.关于机动车交通事故责任，表述正确的是（ ）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	A出卖人交付机动车但未过户，受让人使用时发生事故，由出卖人与受让人承担连带责任</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	B转让拼装车、达到报废标准车发生事故，由转让人与受让人承担连带责任</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	C盗窃机动车发生交通事故，由盗窃人承担赔偿责任，保险公司可以拒绝垫付抢救费</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	D事故后驾驶人逃逸，事故车未参加强制保险，也应由保险公司先行垫付后，再去追偿</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	二、名词解释（每题3分，共15分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.法律行为</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.春秋决狱</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.言论自由</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.危险驾驶罪</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5.博拉例外原则</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	三、简答题（每题5分，共15分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.简述法律执行的概念和特点。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.简述商鞅变法的主要内容。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.简述各级人大代表享有哪些权利？</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	四、论述题（每题10分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.论述特别累犯的成立条件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.试论述诉讼时效的效力包括哪些方面。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2012同等学力法学综合模考试题参考答案</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	一、不定项选择题</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1ABC 2AD 3BC 4ABC 5D 6ABD 7AD 8ACD 9BC 10B</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	11BCD 12B 13D 14ACD 15BD 16BCD 17ABCD 18ABC 19A 20BC</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	21C 22BCD 23C 24BD 25B</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	二、名词解释</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.法律行为，是指人们在其意志控制下实施的受法律调整并能产生法律后果的行为。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.春秋决狱，是指汉朝时实行&ldquo;罢黜百家，独尊儒术&rdquo;的方针后，不仅依汉律审案，也依儒家经典《春秋》等经典著作中提介的精神、原则审理案件的司法制度。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.言论自由，是指公民有权通过各种语言形式宣传自己的思想和观点的自由。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.危险驾驶罪，是指在道路上驾驶机动车追逐竞驶，情节恶劣的，或者在道路上醉酒驾驶机动车的行为。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5.博拉例外原则，是指为提供行政审批所需要的信息，制造、使用、进口专利药品、专利医疗器械，或者专门为其制造、进口专利药品或者专利医疗器械，不视为专利侵权的合理使用原则。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	三、简答题（每题5分，共15分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.简述法律执行的概念和特点：广义的法律执行，是指行政机关、司法机关及其公职人员依照法定职权和程序实施法律的活动，狭义的法律执行，是指行政机关及其公职人员依照法定职权、履行职责，执行法律的活动。其特点有：（1）主体的有限性，只能是行政机关或行使行政职权的组织及其公职人员；（2）主动性， 即执法主体积极主动地履行职责；（3）内容的广泛性，即涉及到政治、经济、文化、社会等生活的方方面面；（4）单方意志性，即行政主体代表国家行使行政权，不必与相对人协商和经其同意；（5）程序的效率性，强调效率优先，兼顾公平和发扬民主。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.简述商鞅变法的主要内容：商鞅变法，是指战国时期的秦国，在法家商鞅的主持下把法律法令作为基本手段的变法运动。其主要内容有：改法为律，扩充法律内容；运用法律手法推行富国强兵的措施；以法律手法剥夺旧贵族的特权；面贯彻法家以法治国和明法重刑的主张；鼓励告奸，实行连坐。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.简述各级人大代表享有哪些权利：代表享有下列权利：（1）出席本级人民代表大会会议，参加审议各项议案、报告和其他议题，发表意见；（2）依法联名提出议案、质询案、罢免案等；（3）提出对各方面工作的建议、批评和意见；（4）参加本级人民代表大会的各项选举；（5）参加本级人民代表大会的各项表决；（6）获得依法执行代表职务所需的信息和各项保障（人身特别保护、言论免责保障、物质经济保障）；（7）法律规定的其他权利。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	四、论述题（每题10分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.论述特别累犯的成立条件：所谓特别累犯，是指危害国家安全犯罪、恐怖活动犯罪、黑社会性质的组织犯罪的犯罪分子，在刑罚执行完毕或者赦免以后，在任何时候再犯上述任一类罪的，都以累犯论处的制度。特别累犯的成立条件有：前罪和后罪均为危害国家安全罪、黑社会性质组织犯罪、恐怖活动犯罪；前罪与后罪所判刑罚的种类和轻重不受限制；犯特定三类罪执行完毕或者赦免后任何时候犯该三类罪中任何一罪，都构成累犯。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.试论述诉讼时效的效力包括哪些方面：我国有关司法解释采取了抗辩权发生说。具体包括这样几方面内容：（1）诉讼时效期间届满，实体权利并不消灭；（2）在债务人方面，诉讼时效期间届满，获得一项抗辩权，即可以诉讼时效已过，拒绝债务履行；（3）因诉讼时效产生的抗辩权，必须债务人来主张，当事人未提出诉讼时效抗辩，人民法院不应对诉讼时效问题进行释明及主动适用诉讼时效的规定进行裁判；（4）债务人提出时效抗辩一般应在一审期间提出，二审中基于新证据提出的除外；（5）诉讼时效期限届满后，债务人自动履行债务的，不得主张不当利利返还；（5）在主债务诉讼时效期间届满时，保证人享有主债务的诉讼时效抗辩权；若未主张该权承担保证责任后向债务人追偿的，法院不予支持，但主债务人同意给付的除外。</p>\r\n','','','59.108.73.73');
