margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（其中导语7分），并制作一条复合型标题（含主题和辅题，5分），并为其配发一篇300字左右的小言论（13分，其中标题3分）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4月27日，记者在接到报料后赶到武汉大学中南医院，并见到了被打的林莉红教授，但因多方原因，林莉红本人不便接受采访，由其学生及同事代为介绍情况。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据林莉红的研究生刘欣琦介绍，4月23日下午约3时40分，当天林莉红有一堂学术讨论课，课间休息时，林老师到楼上找一位老师聊天，&ldquo;过了好长时间还没下来，我们就跑到楼上，在一间办公室看到林老师，她的脸肿了，在那里哭。&rdquo;原来，当天下午课间休息时，林莉红来到法学院赵钢老师办公室与其谈事情，&ldquo;突然，法学院副教授陈少林冲进办公室，对着林老师的右脸就是重重一拳，林老师眼镜被打飞了，人当时就晕过去了。&rdquo;&ldquo;随后，陈少林还要继续动手，赵钢老师冲上来抓住他的胳膊，并从背后把他抱住，推到门外的走廊上。当时陈少林说了&lsquo;他不想活了&rsquo;之类的话。&rdquo;随后林莉红被送往医院，医院初步诊断为&ldquo;外伤引起的血管痉挛&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	刘欣琦说，今年4月6日，陈少林&ldquo;就用脚踹过环境法所一位老师的门，那位老师也是评审委员会的成员之一。当时他声称要同归于尽，那老师说&lsquo;你来呀你来呀&rsquo;，后来陈在外面骂那个老师是男婊子&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	在拨通了陈少林的手机后，陈少林对此事却表示否认。记者就此事与武汉大学法学院院长肖永平及武汉大学党委副书记骆郁廷等人有过接触，其均表示&ldquo;不接受采访&rdquo;。据林莉红熟人介绍，事发后，校方一直在协调善后，准备给陈少林以记过处分，但对此处理意见他表示&ldquo;不能让人接受&rdquo;。武汉作为中国十大名校之一，出此恶性事件，欲仅以记过处分解决，想必难平众怒，最为中国高学府的表率，在师资力量中出现如此&ldquo;为人师表&rdquo;的典范，真是令人汗颜，职称评价机制中的漏洞百出、&ldquo;灰色交易&rdquo;现象何时整改，值得相关专家深思。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据介绍，武汉大学法学院副教授陈少林今年47岁，打人原因是&ldquo;没能评上教授职称&rdquo;，而48岁的林莉红是评审委员会成员之一。林的一名熟人介绍，在这次评审之前，陈少林曾透露过&ldquo;年龄大了，再不评上就没机会了&rdquo;之类的意思。这次没评上教授，据林的熟人介绍，陈也曾在公开场合声称，&ldquo;要对评委会的人一个个收拾，从林老师开始。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	这次评比，与陈少林竞争的有同学院的孙晋和项焱。其中孙晋在2005年11月破格晋升副教授、硕士生导师，现任中国经济法学研究会理事、湖北省经济法学研究会常务理事兼秘书长、亚洲竞争法协会理事。曾在美国伯克利加州大学法学院做访问学者，公开发表论文80余篇，独著和主编6部，参编5本，主持纵向横向课题10余项。三人当中他的实力最强，当选几乎没有异议。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	根据学院网站资料显示，项焱1971年生于贵州贵阳，本硕博都就读于武汉大学。1996年7月开始在武汉大学法学院任教，之前曾在贵州教育学院任教两年。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	出生于1965年的陈少林是湖北武汉人，1994年6月获中南财经政法大学硕士学位，2008年获四川大学博士学位，1994年7月至今在武汉大学法学院任教，并在湖北警官学校兼职教授。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	按照《湖北省教授和副教授职称评审条件》，申报晋升教授职务任职资格，必须具备条件之一便是要在公开出版的学术刊物上发表独撰或为第一作者的高水平学术论文，专业课教师十五篇以上，公共基础课教师十三篇以上，其中，在权威学术期刊上发表论文，专业课教师六篇以上，公共基础课教师五篇以上。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	按照学术论文的发表数量和质量来评职称，这也是目前考量大学老师学术能力的主要标准，一直以来也因为拉关系买稿等负面影响而备受争议。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	搜索中国期刊全文数据库，其中陈少林发表论文12篇，集中于《法学评论》（武汉大学主办）、大学学报（《江汉大学学报》、《湖北社会科学》）。项焱9篇，集中于《法学评论》、《求是》、《求索》。从这一点看，两人旗鼓相当。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	从教学上来讲，项焱2001年获法学院教学成果三等奖；2003年获武汉大学教学成果奖；2003年获武汉大学集体教学成果一等奖；2005年获湖北省高等学校教学成果奖二等奖；2007年获武汉大学优秀导师；而陈没有介绍。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	在评师网上搜索陈少林，获得的好评指数为3.7分，项焱的好评指数为4.6分。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	从出国经历上来看，项焱2004年4月赴泰国参加&ldquo;正当程序研讨会&rdquo;。2001年9月至12月，赴美国参加人权奖学金培训项目。2003年3月至4月，赴美国参加诊所教师交流培训。2005年8月-2006年7月，在美国哥伦比亚大学做访问学者，也是美国公益法研究所研究员。而陈少林没有这样的经历介绍。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	对于陈少林打人事件，有网友评论说：&ldquo;陈少林副教授的做法的确有些过激，身为硕士生导师，本应起学术带头作用，成为学生心中仰慕的标杆，而如今此事一闹，往日声誉不在，昔日威严何存。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	也有网友认为：&ldquo;看了陈少林，觉得很替他悲哀，拥有那么好的学术优势和天然条件，评不上教授只会认为社会黑暗，还报复评委。有那功夫还不如多沉下心来检讨一下自己，自己学术做的怎样，为人处世怎样。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	同等学力人员申请硕士学位学科综合水平全国统一考试</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	新闻学模拟试卷</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	一、名词解释（每小题3分，共30分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.《察世俗每月统纪传》p135 2.王韬p143</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.红中社p167 4.新闻价值p23</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	5.新闻背景p330 6.舆论p50</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	7.电视述评p444 8.主持人评论437</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	9.广播语言 p485 10.广播通讯p473</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	二、简答题（每小题5分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.新闻选择的定义和类型？p36</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.修改新闻稿时要注意的问题主要有哪些？p378</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.网络言论的特点主要有哪些？p458</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.广播电视的传播特点主要有哪些？p467</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	三、分析论述题（每小题10分，共20分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.新中国成立初期，中国共产党是怎样对私营新闻机构进行社会主义改造的？p183</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.结合实际，谈一谈新闻传播为什么要快捷？p31</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	四、实务操作题（30分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	请将下列材料改写成一则300字左右的消息，导语（含标点）不得超过55个字（12分）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（其中导语7分），并制作一条复合型标题（含主题和辅题，5分），并为其配发一篇300字左右的小言论（13分，其中标题3分）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4月27日，记者在接到报料后赶到武汉大学中南医院，并见到了被打的林莉红教授，但因多方原因，林莉红本人不便接受采访，由其学生及同事代为介绍情况。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据林莉红的研究生刘欣琦介绍，4月23日下午约3时40分，当天林莉红有一堂学术讨论课，课间休息时，林老师到楼上找一位老师聊天，&ldquo;过了好长时间还没下来，我们就跑到楼上，在一间办公室看到林老师，她的脸肿了，在那里哭。&rdquo;原来，当天下午课间休息时，林莉红来到法学院赵钢老师办公室与其谈事情，&ldquo;突然，法学院副教授陈少林冲进办公室，对着林老师的右脸就是重重一拳，林老师眼镜被打飞了，人当时就晕过去了。&rdquo;&ldquo;随后，陈少林还要继续动手，赵钢老师冲上来抓住他的胳膊，并从背后把他抱住，推到门外的走廊上。当时陈少林说了&lsquo;他不想活了&rsquo;之类的话。&rdquo;随后林莉红被送往医院，医院初步诊断为&ldquo;外伤引起的血管痉挛&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	刘欣琦说，今年4月6日，陈少林&ldquo;就用脚踹过环境法所一位老师的门，那位老师也是评审委员会的成员之一。当时他声称要同归于尽，那老师说&lsquo;你来呀你来呀&rsquo;，后来陈在外面骂那个老师是男婊子&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	在拨通了陈少林的手机后，陈少林对此事却表示否认。记者就此事与武汉大学法学院院长肖永平及武汉大学党委副书记骆郁廷等人有过接触，其均表示&ldquo;不接受采访&rdquo;。据林莉红熟人介绍，事发后，校方一直在协调善后，准备给陈少林以记过处分，但对此处理意见他表示&ldquo;不能让人接受&rdquo;。武汉作为中国十大名校之一，出此恶性事件，欲仅以记过处分解决，想必难平众怒，最为中国高学府的表率，在师资力量中出现如此&ldquo;为人师表&rdquo;的典范，真是令人汗颜，职称评价机制中的漏洞百出、&ldquo;灰色交易&rdquo;现象何时整改，值得相关专家深思。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据介绍，武汉大学法学院副教授陈少林今年47岁，打人原因是&ldquo;没能评上教授职称&rdquo;，而48岁的林莉红是评审委员会成员之一。林的一名熟人介绍，在这次评审之前，陈少林曾透露过&ldquo;年龄大了，再不评上就没机会了&rdquo;之类的意思。这次没评上教授，据林的熟人介绍，陈也曾在公开场合声称，&ldquo;要对评委会的人一个个收拾，从林老师开始。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	这次评比，与陈少林竞争的有同学院的孙晋和项焱。其中孙晋在2005年11月破格晋升副教授、硕士生导师，现任中国经济法学研究会理事、湖北省经济法学研究会常务理事兼秘书长、亚洲竞争法协会理事。曾在美国伯克利加州大学法学院做访问学者，公开发表论文80余篇，独著和主编6部，参编5本，主持纵向横向课题10余项。三人当中他的实力最强，当选几乎没有异议。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	根据学院网站资料显示，项焱1971年生于贵州贵阳，本硕博都就读于武汉大学。1996年7月开始在武汉大学法学院任教，之前曾在贵州教育学院任教两年。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	出生于1965年的陈少林是湖北武汉人，1994年6月获中南财经政法大学硕士学位，2008年获四川大学博士学位，1994年7月至今在武汉大学法学院任教，并在湖北警官学校兼职教授。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	按照《湖北省教授和副教授职称评审条件》，申报晋升教授职务任职资格，必须具备条件之一便是要在公开出版的学术刊物上发表独撰或为第一作者的高水平学术论文，专业课教师十五篇以上，公共基础课教师十三篇以上，其中，在权威学术期刊上发表论文，专业课教师六篇以上，公共基础课教师五篇以上。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	按照学术论文的发表数量和质量来评职称，这也是目前考量大学老师学术能力的主要标准，一直以来也因为拉关系买稿等负面影响而备受争议。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	搜索中国期刊全文数据库，其中陈少林发表论文12篇，集中于《法学评论》（武汉大学主办）、大学学报（《江汉大学学报》、《湖北社会科学》）。项焱9篇，集中于《法学评论》、《求是》、《求索》。从这一点看，两人旗鼓相当。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	从教学上来讲，项焱2001年获法学院教学成果三等奖；2003年获武汉大学教学成果奖；2003年获武汉大学集体教学成果一等奖；2005年获湖北省高等学校教学成果奖二等奖；2007年获武汉大学优秀导师；而陈没有介绍。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	在评师网上搜索陈少林，获得的好评指数为3.7分，项焱的好评指数为4.6分。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	从出国经历上来看，项焱2004年4月赴泰国参加&ldquo;正当程序研讨会&rdquo;。2001年9月至12月，赴美国参加人权奖学金培训项目。2003年3月至4月，赴美国参加诊所教师交流培训。2005年8月-2006年7月，在美国哥伦比亚大学做访问学者，也是美国公益法研究所研究员。而陈少林没有这样的经历介绍。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	对于陈少林打人事件，有网友评论说：&ldquo;陈少林副教授的做法的确有些过激，身为硕士生导师，本应起学术带头作用，成为学生心中仰慕的标杆，而如今此事一闹，往日声誉不在，昔日威严何存。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	也有网友认为：&ldquo;看了陈少林，觉得很替他悲哀，拥有那么好的学术优势和天然条件，评不上教授只会认为社会黑暗，还报复评委。有那功夫还不如多沉下心来检讨一下自己，自己学术做的怎样，为人处世怎样。&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; \">参考答案：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	只因未评正教授 法学教授也违法</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	武大法学副教授拳打评委</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	本报讯 因为&ldquo;没能评上教授职称&rdquo;，武汉大学法学院的一名副教授竟对该院一名教授大打出手，被打者正是评审委员会成员之一。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4月27日，记者接到报料后赶到武汉大学中南医院，并见到了被打的林莉红教授，据林莉红的研究生刘欣琦介绍，4月23日下午，林莉红来到法学院赵钢老师办公室与其谈事情，&ldquo;突然，法学院副教授陈少林冲进办公室，对着林老师的右脸就是重重一拳，林老师眼镜被打飞了，人当时就晕过去了。&rdquo;随后林莉红被送往医院，医院初步诊断为&ldquo;外伤引起的血管痉挛&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据介绍，武汉大学法学院副教授陈少林今年47岁，打人原因是&ldquo;没能评上教授职称&rdquo;，而48岁的林莉红是评审委员会成员之一。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	让人费解的&ldquo;副教授拳打教授&rdquo;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据媒体报道，日前，武大法学院一名副教授竟对该院的一名教授大出打手，其打人原因是&ldquo;没能评上教授职称&rdquo;，而被打的教授正是评审委员会成员之一。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	法治社会，有话说话，有理讲理，再不济也可入禀法院，讨要公平公正。然而，一位知名学府法学院副教授只因没被如愿评上教授职称，居然&ldquo;要对评委会的人一个个收拾&rdquo;，这已经够雷人，够令人惊诧了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	可更让人费解的是，打人事件之后，从武大校级领导到法学院领导居然都闪烁其词，即便记者一再追逐采访，试图请他们出声，可后者也都不接受采访。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	这些年来，高校职称评定弊端不少，已经屡屡遭到舆论批评，如今一出拳打评审教授的闹剧之后，校方却不置一词，仅以一副不得罪人的&ldquo;和事老&rdquo;面目示人，这是为什么？岂不让人怀疑职称评定是否存在猫腻？</p>\r\n','','','59.108.73.73');

text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	据<a href=\"http://www.ruconline.com/\" target=\"_blank\">人大在职研究生报考网</a>了解，经济学在职研究生毕业论文所写的经济论文是研究经济现象，探讨经济规律，发展经济理论，指导经济工作实践的学术性文章。在职研究生学员们在写作中一定要明确经济学知识结构与学术研究新进展，从选题立意到成文答辩有一个清晰完整的思路。以下是对经济学论文写作的完整版解析，供学员参考使用。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	一、要求</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.必须符合客观经济规律的要求，正确表述经济活动的一般规律和特殊规律；</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.必须与党和国家的路线、方针、政策、法规相一致；</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.必须能够指导经济工作实践，提高经济效益；</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.语言文字力求简洁明了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	经济论文特点：要体现出社会价值和可行性意义。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（一）现实性：对现实有借鉴、指导意义</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（二）学术性：有一定理论水平</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（三）独创性：有创新点论点论据论证过程</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（四）效益性：有可行性意义，有社会价值</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	二、选题</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	经济论文的选题很重要，它是经济科研活动的起点，也是论文写作的起点。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（一）概念</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	选题就是指在对已获取的大量材料进行分析研究的基础上，提出问题，确定科学研究和文章写作的方向与目标。 选题有双层意思：一是科学研究的课题选择和确定，二是指文章的题目的选择和确定。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	课题是指科学研究的特定问题，是为了特定需要所进行研究和讨论的主要问题，或者需要解决的重大事项，是研究者力求获得结果的具体研究项目。 文题是研究者根据课题研究过程，通过具体材料提炼出观点和见解后，写成文章的标题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（二）意义</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1、选题可以规划课题研究的方向和目标</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2、选题在一定程度上决定着论文的价值和成败</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3、选题还可以促进知识的深化和能力的提高</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（三）原则</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	选题遵循的原则是：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.需要性原则。指从社会需要和经济学科建设本身的需要出发，尤其注意选择那些亟待解决的问题作为论题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.可能性原则。要求对预期完成论题的可能性，即主客观条件加以周密准确的估计。主观条件指研究者的学术知识、研究经验和能力素质。客观条件主要指实验手段、资金等是否具备。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	3.创造性原则。创造性是科研的命脉，也是选题的根本原则。或理论上有创新，或方法上有创新，或应用上有突破。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	4.科学性原则。选题必须有事实根据和理论根据。要以辩证唯物主义基本原理为指南，要以客观经济规律为基础。 经济论文有宏观微观之分，选题的侧重面和要求也有所不同。写作宏观经济论文，必须全面了解宏观经济学的特点，熟悉党和国家的经济方针政策和有关的经济理论知识。写作微观经济论文，要了解微观经济学的观点论题的选择不能离开企业经营管理的范畴，必须以懂得企业经营管理的各项基础工作为前提，对信息、定额管理、计量、计划等工作及必要的和合理的各项规章制度、岗位责任制、全员劳动合同制等方面的情况都要有所了解和掌握。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	（四）途径</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	选题的途径：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	1.在导师的指导下确定选题</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; border-bottom-width: 0px; border-left-width: 0px; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	2.从搜集、阅读资料中获得选题</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 0px; text-indent: 2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; border-top-width: 0px; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: 宋体; text-align: left; \">\r\n	一般说来，写作经济论文的选题可根据下列线索进行：（1）经济理论中的空白区；（2）现实经济活动中亟待解决的问题；（3）经济学科与其他学科交叉的部分；（4）对基础经济理论、经济史的考证与发掘；（5）解决传统经济理论和新经济事实之间的矛盾和冲突；（6）扩展原有理论及其应用范围；（7）在原研究成果的基础上进行深入研究。</p>\r\n','','','59.108.73.73');

Choose the best one and mark the corresponding letter with a single bar across the square brackets on your machine-scoring ANSWER SHEET.<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPassage One<br />\r\nA 10-year-old boy decided to study judo(柔道) despite the fact that he had lost his left arm in a terrible car accident. The boy began lessons with an old Japanese judo master， and he was doing well. But he couldn&#39;t understand why， after three months of training，the master had taught him only one move.<br />\r\n&quot;Sir，&quot; the boy finally said， &quot;shouldn&#39;t I be learning more moves?&quot;<br />\r\n&ldquo;This the only move you know， but this is the only move you&#39;ll ever need to know，&quot; the master replied.<br />\r\nNot quite understanding， but believing in his teacher， the boy kept training.<br />\r\nSeveral months later， the master took the boy to his first tournament(锦标赛).<br />\r\nSurprising himself， the boy easily won his first two matches. The third match<br />\r\nproved to be more difficult， but after some time， his opponent became impatient and charged; the boy skillfully used his one move to win the match. Still amazed by his success， the boy was now in the finals.<br />\r\nThis time， his opponent was bigger， stronger， and more experienced. For a while，the boy appeared to be overmatched. Concerned that&nbsp; the boy might get hurt , the&nbsp; referee alled a&nbsp; time-out ,He was about to stop the match when the judomaster intervened.<br />\r\n&quot;No，&quot; the judo master insisted，&quot;Let him continue.&quot;<br />\r\nSoon after the match resumed， his opponent made a critical mistake: he dropped his guard. Instantly， the boy used his move to pin him. The boy had won the match and the tournament. He was the champion.<br />\r\nOn the way home， the boy and his judo master reviewed every move in each and every match. Then the boy summoned the courage to ask what was really on his mind.<br />\r\n&quot;Sir， how did I win the tour&tau;lament with only one move?&quot;<br />\r\n&quot;You won for two. reasons，&quot; the master answered.<br />\r\n&quot;First， you&#39;ve almost mastered one of the most difficult throws in all of judo.<br />\r\nSecond， the only known defense for that move is for your opponent to grab your left arm&rdquo;<br />\r\n<br />\r\n31．Why did the boy want to learn judo?<br />\r\nA. He wanted to get over the accident.<br />\r\nB. He wanted to make up for his disability.<br />\r\nC. He wanted to exercise his right arm.<br />\r\nD&nbsp; .The reason was not mentioned in the passage<br />\r\n<br />\r\n32.When a referee calls a &quot;time-out&rdquo;__________<br />\r\nA. the time has run out<br />\r\nB. the game stops for a short time<br />\r\nC. either side can claim victory<br />\r\nD. the game ends in a tie<br />\r\n<br />\r\n33. One can turn a weakness into an advantage.<br />\r\nB. It is very difficult to have a good teacher.<br />\r\nC&nbsp;&nbsp; Even a disabled person can win a match.<br />\r\nD.&nbsp; Practice makes perfect.<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPassageTwo<br />\r\nMy five-year-old daughter knew exactly what she wanted for Christmas of 1977， and told me so. Yes， she still would like the pink-and-green plastic umbrella， books， long nightgown， slippers-fine. But really， there was only one thing that mattered: a Barbie Townhouse， with all the accessories.<br />\r\nThis was a surprise. Rebecca was not a Barbie girl， preferred stuffed animals to dolls， and wasn&#39;t drawn to play in a structured environment. Always a make-up-the-rules， design-my-own-world， do-it-my-way kid. Maybe， I thought， the point wasn&#39;t Barbie but the house， which she could claim，for herself， since we&rsquo;d&nbsp; already moved five times during her brief life.<br />\r\nNext day， I stopped at the mall. The huge Barbie Townhouse box was there: &quot;3 Floors of High-Styled Fun! Elevator Can Stop on All Floors!&quot; Some Assembly Required.Uh-oh. My track record for assembling things was miserable. Brooklyn-born， I was raised in apartment buildings in a family that didn&#39;t build things. A few years earlier，I &#39;d spent one week assernbling a six-foot-tall jungle gym from a kit containing so many parts. I spent the first four hours sorting and the last two hours trying to figure out why there were so many pieces. The day after I finished building it， as if to remind me of my limitations， a tornado(龙卷风) touched down close enough to scatter the jungle gym across an acre of field.<br />\r\nI assembled the Barbie Townhouse on Christmas Eve. Making it level， keeping the columns from looking like they&#39;d melted and been refrozen， and getting that elevator to work were almost more than I could manage. And building it in curse-free silence so my daughter would continue sleeping--if， in fact， she was sleeping-added a layer of&nbsp; challenge .By dawn I was done .<br />\r\nShortly thereafter， my daughter walked into the living room. Her surprise may not be real ， but her delight was utterly genuine and moves me. to this day， 34 years later. Rebecca had spurred&nbsp; me to do something、I didn&#39;t think I could do. It was for her， and一like so much of the privilege of being her farther--it brought me further outside myself and let me overcome doubts about me capacities .<br />\r\n<br />\r\n37.In the author&rsquo;s eyes , his little daughter was_______<br />\r\nA. obedient&nbsp; B. unstable<br />\r\nC. original&nbsp;&nbsp; D. stubborn<br />\r\n<br />\r\n38 .The author thought that his daughter&rsquo;s choice of the Barbie Townhouse ,________<br />\r\nA .was natural for a five-year-old girl<br />\r\nB．was influenced by her life experience<br />\r\nC．reflected the change in her taste<br />\r\nD．brought her back normal<br />\r\n<br />\r\n39. What can be learned about the relationship between the author and his daughter?<br />\r\nA. They are on good terms with each other.<br />\r\nB. They barely speak to each other.<br />\r\nC. They are polite but cold to each other.<br />\r\nD. They keep secrets from each other.<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPassage Three<br />\r\nIt is all very well to blame traffic&nbsp; jam， the cost of petrol and the fast pace of modem life， but manners on the roads are becoming deplorable. Everybody knows that the nicest men become monsters behind the wheel. It is all very well， again ,to have a tiger in the tank， but to have one in the driver&#39;s seat is another matter. You might tolerate the odd road-hog(占道者)， but nowadays the well-mannered motorist is the exception to the rule. Perhaps the situation calls for a &quot;Be Kind to Other Drivers&quot; campaign， otherwise it may get completely out of hand.<br />\r\nRoad courtesy is not only good manners， but good sense too, It takes the most good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to hit back when subjected to uncivilized behavior. A friendly nod or a wave of acknowledgement in response to an act of courtesy helps to create an atmosphere of goodwill and tolerance so necessary&nbsp; in modem traffic conditions. But such acknowledgements of courtesy are all too rare today. Many drivers nowadays don&#39;t even seem able to recognize courtesy when they see it.<br />\r\nContrary to general opinion， young drivers have better manners than their seniors. But this is short-lived in the world of modern driving where many drivers neither expect nor give any mercy. This may be encouraged on the battlefield but is out of place on the roads.<br />\r\nLorry drivers say they have almost abandoned the practice of signaling cars to overtake when the road is clear, because many of the cars took too long to pass. They couldn&#39;t be bothered to select a lower gear. The car drivers, after overtaking, slow eddown again and hogged the road. Again, a motoring magazine has recently drawn attention to the increasing number of drivers who never wait for gaps.&quot;They manufacture them by force， using their direction indicators as a threat rather than a warning.&quot;Punch-ups(打群架)are&nbsp; quite common. It can&#39;t be long before we hear of pistols and knives being used.<br />\r\nDriving is essentially a state of mind. However technically skilled a driver may be，he can&#39;t be an advanced motorist if he is always arrogant and aggressive.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n43. The author is most concerned about&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. traffic jam B. road manners<br />\r\nC. fast pace of life&nbsp; D. high cost of petrol<br />\r\n<br />\r\n44.&nbsp; The word &quot;deplorable &quot; (Para. 1) most probably means &quot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;.<br />\r\nA. more serious&nbsp;&nbsp; B. more tempting<br />\r\nC. disturbing&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. noticeable<br />\r\n<br />\r\n45. What is the main idea of Paragraph 2?<br />\r\nA. Many drivers tend to fight back against rude behaviors.<br />\r\nB. A little courtesy may help ease the tensions on the road.<br />\r\nC. Goodwill and tolerance may help relieve traffic jam.<br />\r\nD. Many drivers nowadays lack a good sense of courtesy.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n46. It can be learned from Paragraph 3 that&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. young drivers are more aggressive<br />\r\nB. young drivers would soon lose their good manners<br />\r\nC. elder drivers are more cautious<br />\r\nD. elder drivers should improve their driving skills<br />\r\n<br />\r\n47. An example of good manners on the roads is&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. signaling cars to overtake&nbsp; B. manufacturing a gap<br />\r\nC. selecting a lower gear&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. using the direction indicator<br />\r\n<br />\r\n48. According to the author， a good driver should&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. be technically skilled&nbsp;&nbsp; B. have a good state of mind<br />\r\nC. be sympathetic with others&nbsp; D. take good care of his vehicle<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPassage Four<br />\r\nOn how the world has changed over the last 50 years，not all of it has been good. As you are looking for organic food information, you have obviously become aware that a better alternative exists and you are taking a critical look at the source and production practices of the companies producing the world&#39;s food supplies.<br />\r\nThe purpose of organic food information is to give you an understanding of what is going into your food. You will see that there are many benefits to organic food that you didn&#39;t know before. The basis behind knowing about organic food information is the fact that farmers are resorting to using artificial fertilizers and pesticides(杀虫剂)to control disease and insect attack in order to produce more crops to satisfy growing demand. These artificial fertilizers leave something poisonous in and on the fruit and vegetables we consume which in turn is absorbed and stored by our bodies.<br />\r\nEven the quality of food has gone down in recent years. Today&#39;s fruits have nowhere near the Vitamin C levels they did at one time. However，with organic food information you learn that organic food has fifty percent more nutrients， minerals and vitamins than any other form of produce that has been grown under intensive farming. If you are eating non-organic produce you will have to eat more fruit in order to make up for this deficiency. But then the dangerous cycle continues since you will be eating more chemicals that are worse for your health than they are good for you.<br />\r\nAnother aspect of organic food information is the production of&nbsp; meat and poultry (家禽). Most only consider produce when it comes to organic food information disregarding the antibiotics and hormones that are given to both cattle and poultry that are being force fed. Ask yourself what happens to all these antibiotics and hormones when the animal is killed， the remaining of these antibiotics and growth hormones reside in the meat which are then consumed， digested and stored in human bodies. There is no way that an animal that isn&#39;t kept in healthy conditions can produce healthy food for humans to eat.<br />\r\nYou have nothing to lose by trying organic product，not only will it be healthy for you but you will also be able to eat produce and meat the way they are supposed to be. You will likely be so impressed with the taste of organic fruit that you will never return to the mass-produced fruit again. While cost and availability can be a big issue for some，you can do a bit of research online and find a local store that stocks organic produce for a reasonable price.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n49. It is stated in Paragraph 1 that organic food&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. is considered as a better choice<br />\r\nB. is mostly supplied by world-famous companies<br />\r\nC. has become popular over the last 50 years<br />\r\nD. reflects the change of production practices<br />\r\n<br />\r\n50. Farmers use artificial fertilizers and pesticides to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. satisfy people&#39;s critical demand&nbsp;&nbsp; B. develop better farming technology<br />\r\nC. get a higher crop yield&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. keep people in better health<br />\r\n<br />\r\n51. According to Paragraph 3，organic food&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. has gone down in quality&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B. has more nutrients<br />\r\nC. can replace mass-produced food&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; D. lacks Vitamin C<br />\r\n<br />\r\n52. What does the author say about meat and poultry?<br />\r\nA. Organic meat and poultry is hardly available.<br />\r\nB. A great amount of meat is consumed every year.<br />\r\nC. Merciless killing of the animals lowers their quality.<br />\r\nD. They may contain antibiotics and growth hormones.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n53. In the last paragraph, people are advised to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. eat traditional produce and meat<br />\r\nB. return to mass-produced fruits<br />\r\nC. do the cost and availability research<br />\r\nD. try organic product for better health and taste<br />\r\n<br />\r\n54. This passage is mainly about&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. the benefits of organic food information<br />\r\nB. the challenges facing the world food industry<br />\r\nC. changes in food production practices<br />\r\nD. a growing demand high quality food<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPassage Five<br />\r\n<br />\r\nDrinking wastewater? The idea may sound distasteful，but new federally funded research says more Americans are doing so-whether they know or not-and this reuse will be increasingly necessary as the U.S. population expands.<br />\r\nTreated wastewater poses no greater health risks than existing water supplies and， in some cases, may be even safer to drink，according to a report released by the National Research Council. &ldquo;We believe water reuse is an option to deal with growing water scarcity,&nbsp; especially in coastal areas，&rdquo; says Jorg Drewes， an engineering professor at the Colorado School of Mines. &quot;This can be done reliably without putting the public at risk，&quot; he says， citing technological advances. He says it&#39;s a waste not to reuse the nation&#39;s wastewater， because almost all of it is treated before discharge. This water includes storm runoff(径流) as well as used water from homes， businesses and factories.<br />\r\nIn many places，the report says，the public does not realize it&#39;s drinking water that was treated after being discharged as wastewater somewhere upstream: For example， wastewater discharged into the Trinity River from Dallas/Fort Worth flows south into Lake Livingston，the source for Houston&#39;s drinking water.<br />\r\nDespite the growing importance of this reuse，the report says there&#39;s been no systemic analysis of its extent nationwide since a 1980 study by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA). Alan Roberson of the American Water Works Association says wastewater reuse is common, so the council&#39;s report is important but not surprising. Roberson expects this recycling will continue to increase，especially for irrigation and industrial needs. He says it will take longer to establish potable(适于饮用的) uses because of public nervousness about drinking wastewater， however treated.<br />\r\n&ldquo;We have to do something to address water scarcity&rdquo;，says Olga Naidenko， a senior scientist at the non-profit Environmental Working Group. &ldquo;Less than 10 of potable water is used for drinking，cooking，showering or dishwashing. We flush it down the toilet，literally.&rdquo; Technologies exist to safely treat the water，she says， although some are expensive.<br />\r\nThe report says water reuse projects tend to cost more， than most water conservation options but less than seawater desalination(脱盐) and other supply alternatives. It calls on the EPA to develop rules that set safe national standards.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n55. As can be learned from Paragraph 1, drinking wastewater&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .<br />\r\nA. is to become a growing necessity<br />\r\nB. is well received by the Americans<br />\r\nC. has caused heated public debates<br />\r\nD. has become the dominant option<br />\r\n<br />\r\n56. Which of the following statements would Jorg Drewes agree to?<br />\r\nA. Water reuse may eventually put the public at risk.<br />\r\nB. Water reuse is preferable to wasting water.<br />\r\nC. Water reuse is far from a solution to water shortage.<br />\r\nD. Water reuse is possible only after greater tech advances.<br />\r\n<br />\r\n57. Setting up national standards for water reuse.<br />\r\nD. Monitoring water supplies at a national level.<br />\r\n<br />\r\nPart IVCloze (15 minutes， 15 points， 1 for each)<br />\r\n<br />\r\nDirections: In this part， there is a passage with J 5 blanks. Because Brussels sprouts are bitter， and kids generally don&#39;t like bitter tastes. But it&#39;s not their&nbsp; 61 . Yes， she still would like the pink-and-green plastic umbrella， books， long nightgown， slippers-fine. But really， there was only one thing that mattered: a Barbie Townhouse， with all the accessories.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	This was a surprise. Rebecca was not a Barbie girl， preferred stuffed animals to dolls， and wasn&#39;t drawn to play in a structured environment. Always a make-up-the-rules， design-my-own-world， do-it-my-way kid. Maybe， I thought， the point wasn&#39;t Barbie but the house， which she could claim，for herself， since we&rsquo;d &nbsp;already moved five times during her brief life.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Next day， I stopped at the mall. The huge Barbie Townhouse box was there: &quot;3 Floors of High-Styled Fun! Elevator Can Stop on All Floors!&quot; Some Assembly Required.Uh-oh. My track record for assembling things was miserable. Brooklyn-born， I was raised in apartment buildings in a family that didn&#39;t build things. A few years earlier，I &#39;d spent one week assernbling a six-foot-tall jungle gym from a kit containing so many parts. I spent the first four hours sorting and the last two hours trying to figure out why there were so many pieces. The day after I finished building it， as if to remind me of my limitations， a tornado(龙卷风) touched down close enough to scatter the jungle gym across an acre of field.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	I assembled the Barbie Townhouse on Christmas Eve. Making it level， keeping the columns from looking like they&#39;d melted and been refrozen， and getting that elevator to work were almost more than I could manage. And building it in curse-free silence so my daughter would continue sleeping--if， in fact， she was sleeping-added a layer of &nbsp;challenge .By dawn I was done .</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Shortly thereafter， my daughter walked into the living room. Her surprise may not be real ， but her delight was utterly genuine and moves me. to this day， 34 years later. Rebecca had spurred &nbsp;me to do something、I didn&#39;t think I could do. It was for her， and一like so much of the privilege of being her farther--it brought me further outside myself and let me overcome doubts about me capacities .</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	37.In the author&rsquo;s eyes , his little daughter was_______</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. obedient &nbsp;B. unstable</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. original &nbsp; D. stubborn</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	38 .The author thought that his daughter&rsquo;s choice of the Barbie Townhouse ,________</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A .was natural for a five-year-old girl</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	B．was influenced by her life experience</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C．reflected the change in her taste</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	D．brought her back normal</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	39. For the author， assembling things_______&bull;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. was largely in his blood B. was a challenge he enjoyed</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. was always his weak point &nbsp;D. was part of his family education</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	40. Assembling the Barbie Townhouse_________________.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. brought out the author&#39;s potentials</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	B. turned out to be easier than expected</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. accually drove the author crazy.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	D. was a bad memory for the author</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	41. In the last paragraph the author mainly expressed______</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. his pride in being a father . B. his gratitude to his daughter</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. his concern about his capability &nbsp; &nbsp; D. his delight in helping his daughter</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	42. What can be learned about the relationship between the author and his daughter?</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. They are on good terms with each other.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	B. They barely speak to each other.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. They are polite but cold to each other.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	D. They keep secrets from each other.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Passage Three</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	It is all very well to blame traffic &nbsp;jam， the cost of petrol and the fast pace of modem life， but manners on the roads are becoming deplorable. Everybody knows that the nicest men become monsters behind the wheel. It is all very well， again ,to have a tiger in the tank， but to have one in the driver&#39;s seat is another matter. You might tolerate the odd road-hog(占道者)， but nowadays the well-mannered motorist is the exception to the rule. Perhaps the situation calls for a &quot;Be Kind to Other Drivers&quot; campaign， otherwise it may get completely out of hand.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Road courtesy is not only good manners， but good sense too, It takes the most good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to hit back when subjected to uncivilized behavior. A friendly nod or a wave of acknowledgement in response to an act of courtesy helps to create an atmosphere of goodwill and tolerance so necessary &nbsp;in modem traffic conditions. But such acknowledgements of courtesy are all too rare today. Many drivers nowadays don&#39;t even seem able to recognize courtesy when they see it.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Contrary to general opinion， young drivers have better manners than their seniors. But this is short-lived in the world of modern driving where many drivers neither expect nor give any mercy. This may be encouraged on the battlefield but is out of place on the roads.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Lorry drivers say they have almost abandoned the practice of signaling cars to overtake when the road is clear, because many of the cars took too long to pass. They couldn&#39;t be bothered to select a lower gear. The car drivers, after overtaking, slow eddown again and hogged the road. Again, a motoring magazine has recently drawn attention to the increasing number of drivers who never wait for gaps.&quot;They manufacture them by force， using their direction indicators as a threat rather than a warning.&quot;Punch-ups(打群架)are &nbsp;quite common. It can&#39;t be long before we hear of pistols and knives being used.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Driving is essentially a state of mind. However technically skilled a driver may be，he can&#39;t be an advanced motorist if he is always arrogant and aggressive.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	43. The author is most concerned about &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. traffic jam B. road manners</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. fast pace of life &nbsp;D. high cost of petrol</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	44. &nbsp;The word &quot;deplorable &quot; (Para. 1) most probably means &quot; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &quot;.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. more serious &nbsp; B. more tempting</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. disturbing &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;D. noticeable</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	45. What is the main idea of Paragraph 2?</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. Many drivers tend to fight back against rude behaviors.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	B. A little courtesy may help ease the tensions on the road.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. Goodwill and tolerance may help relieve traffic jam.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	D. Many drivers nowadays lack a good sense of courtesy.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	46. It can be learned from Paragraph 3 that &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. young drivers are more aggressive</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	B. young drivers would soon lose their good manners</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. elder drivers are more cautious</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	D. elder drivers should improve their driving skills</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	47. An example of good manners on the roads is &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A. signaling cars to overtake &nbsp;B. manufacturing a gap</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	C. selecting a lower gear &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;D. using the direction indicator</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	48. Choose the best one and mark the corresponding letter with a single bar across the square brackets on your machine-scoring ANSWER SHEET.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Passage One</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A 10-year-old boy decided to study judo(柔道) despite the fact that he had lost his left arm in a terrible car accident. The boy began lessons with an old Japanese judo master， and he was doing well. But he couldn&#39;t understand why， after three months of training，the master had taught him only one move.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&quot;Sir，&quot; the boy finally said， &quot;shouldn&#39;t I be learning more moves?&quot;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&ldquo;This the only move you know， but this is the only move you&#39;ll ever need to know，&quot; the master replied.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Not quite understanding， but believing in his teacher， the boy kept training.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Several months later， the master took the boy to his first tournament(锦标赛).</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Surprising himself， the boy easily won his first two matches. The third match</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	proved to be more difficult， but after some time， his opponent became impatient and charged; the boy skillfully used his one move to win the match. Still amazed by his success， the boy was now in the finals.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	This time， his opponent was bigger， stronger， and more experienced. For a while，the boy appeared to be overmatched. Concerned that &nbsp;the boy might get hurt , the &nbsp;referee alled a &nbsp;time-out ,He was about to stop the match when the judomaster intervened.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&quot;No，&quot; the judo master insisted，&quot;Let him continue.&quot;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Soon after the match resumed， his opponent made a critical mistake: he dropped his guard. Instantly， the boy used his move to pin him. The boy had won the match and the tournament. He was the champion.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	On the way home， the boy and his judo master reviewed every move in each and every match. Then the boy summoned the courage to ask what was really on his mind.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&quot;Sir， how did I win the tour&tau;lament with only one move?&quot;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&quot;You won for two. reasons，&quot; the master answered.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&quot;First， you&#39;ve almost mastered one of the most difficult throws in all of judo.</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	Second， the only known defense for that move is for your opponent to grab your left arm&rdquo;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	31．Why did the boy want to learn judo?</div>\r\n<div>\r\n	A.
